compliant.section: • 隱私權保護政策內容，包括本網站如何處理在您使用網站服務時收集到的個人識別資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: • 非經您書面同意，本網站不會將個人資料用於其他用途。

non_compliant.section: • 當您造訪本網站或使用本網站所提供之功能服務時，我們將視該服務功能性質，請您提供必要的個人資料，並在該特定目的範圍內處理及利用您的個人資料；
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly state the legal basis for processing data (e.g., consent, contract performance, legitimate interest) and specify the purposes of processing for each data category collected. It should also clarify what "necessary personal data" entails for each service.

non_compliant.section: 本網站在您使用服務信箱、問卷調查等互動性功能時，會保留您所提供的姓名、電子郵件地址、聯絡方式及使用時間等。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: The policy should specify the legal basis for processing this data and the specific purpose for collecting each data point. It should also clarify the retention period for this data.

non_compliant.section: • 於一般瀏覽時，伺服器會自行記錄相關行徑，包括您使用連線設備的 IP 位址、使用時間、使用的瀏覽器、瀏覽及點選資料記錄等，做為我們增進網站服務的參考依據，此記錄為內部應用，決不對外公佈。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data
non_compliant.amend: Collecting IP addresses and other browsing data is considered personal data processing. The policy needs to specify the legal basis for this processing (e.g., legitimate interest) and provide users with information about their rights, including the right to object to this processing.
